investigatorQuestion.text: Where were you on the night of the incident?

maskAnswers.playerLine: I was at home, working late. I have timestamps on my computer files that can verify this.

lowTension.text: Hmm, convenient. But timestamps can be faked.
We'll need to verify that with your IT department.
A likely story. We've heard that one before.

highTension.text: That's... actually quite helpful. We can work with that.
Digital evidence. Good. We'll verify this promptly.
Finally, someone who keeps records. Continue.

maskAnswers.playerLine: I... I was alone. It's been so hard since everything happened. I just needed time to think.

lowTension.text: Spare me the tears. I've seen better performances.
You're going to have to do better than that.

highTension.text: I understand it's difficult, but I need specifics.
Take your time, but I still need an answer.
Being alone isn't an alibi. Where exactly?

maskAnswers.playerLine: Why does it matter? You've already made up your mind about me!

lowTension.text: Defensive, are we? That's very telling.
Anger won't help your case. Answer the question.
Interesting reaction for an innocent person.

highTension.text: I haven't made up my mind. That's why I'm asking.
Calm down. I'm just doing my job here.
Let's stay civil. Where were you?

maskAnswers.playerLine: Detective, I'm sure someone of your experience can tell I'm being completely honest here.

lowTension.text: Don't try to butter me up. Just answer.
I've been doing this too long for charm to work.

highTension.text: Flattering, but I still need a straight answer.
I appreciate the compliment, but where were you?
Charming. Now, your location that night?
